views.markdown:
AlertsPercent
Supports ios 11 - ios 12.1.2

AlertsPercent will help you not to forget your device is connected to the charger and will remind you that the battery is fully charged
Or you can choose the level of geese you want to charge your device and AlertsPercent will alert you and receive an alarm with a sound that you choose from a long list of sounds

And so you can set the battery Low apart and receive a notification including a sound that you choose from a long list of sounds

If you have any questions or requests for special sounds you are welcome to follow me on Twitter @DevelopApple

Configure options from Settings.

Settings should apply without the need of a respring

Support for A12 (arm64e)
Added loop for each alert
